section.title: Correct Uneven File Permissions
section.para: Ensures files and directories do not have uneven file permissions. This means that the group must not have more permissions than the owner. If the permissions are uneven, this module will reset the permissions so that the extra permissions will be removed.
This module does not check files inside user home directories.

listitem.para: CC-3 - Secure Configurations for Hardware and Software on Laptops, Workstations, and Servers
GEN001140 - System files and directories must not have uneven access permissions.
